DOC.brief_summary: This randomized trial , assess Misoprostol efficacy cervical preparation several hour prior hysteroscopy , compare different route administration ( PO/PV/buccal ) . Initial cervical dilatation assess , well surgical ease dilatation , time require achieve dilatation patient preference .
DOC.brief_title: Same-day Cervical Preparation With Misoprostol Before Hysteroscopy
DOC.criteria: Patients admit elective hysteroscopy ( diagnostic/surgical ) Wolfson Medical Center Written consent supply Contraindications prostaglandin treatment ( severe asthma , glaucoma , severe cardiac disease , renal failure ) Prostaglandin allergy Pregnancy Genital infection Spaceoccupying lesion endocervical canal Prior cervical surgery
